name: C/C++
reason: C++ was taught to me in 11-12th grade. It was the first programming language that i learned and it helped me a lot to get a clear understanding of concepts ranging from basics like variables functions to advanced concepts pointers

name: HTML and CSS
reason: This was the one of the first thing that i learned in terms of programing. It was pretty nice to see websites that felt alienating before, and make one by yourself. It reserves a speacial place in heart

name: Javascript
reason: JS is the first programming language that i have learned seriously. After learning html and css, I jumped in javascript and it presented a plethora of things to learn.. ranging from concepts like loops to promises.

name: React.js
reason: React.js helps to make faster websites. It reduces the amount of redundent code, by making it very easy to create reusable component. I am more comfortable with React as compared to only html+css solution. In general any frontend framework does great, wheather it be vue or svelte that helps create reusable components.

name: Backend
reason: I have used both Nodejs for backend development. I have used express for nodejs development. It is just awesome. It provides a great power to work on that. Apart from that I have also tried Flask and Django in the Python world. I have used Flask to create an sever-side-rendered website during an hackathon.

name: Haskell
reason: Recently, I started learning haskell on a friends recomendation and I have loved it so far. It is fun to program in a purely function language where you have nothing but function. I learned lot about function programing. I would recomend everyone to try it once, it is a great experience.
